catalog_info.title: Language Development: Undergraduate Laboratory Course: Research Seminar
catalog_info.notes: For undergraduates seeking research experience, especially in preparation for undergraduate theses.
catalog_info.prereq: Recommended: Science of Living Systems 20 or its predecessors plus either Psychology 13 or Science of Living Systems 15
catalog_info.description: Students participate in research on language acquisition, language comprehension, and language production. Each student has responsibility for a project. Weekly meeting to discuss student projects and readings that are relevant to them. Ten hours a week commitment (includes lab meeting).
